mapper.select: SELECT do.dictid, do.code, do.cname, do.ename FROM dictdef df,dictinfo do WHERE df.dictid = do.dictid AND df.dictid = #{dictid} ORDER BY do.dictid
mapper.update:
update dictinfo
dictid = #{dictinfo.dictid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{dictinfo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{dictinfo.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ename = #{dictinfo.ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dictid = #{dictinfo.dictid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and code = #{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from dictinfo where dictid=#{dictid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
